name: Mr Arms Gun
description:
Flip the gun and get ready to give some headshots to bad guys in our new game. Your granny definitely would not like our new jailbreak simulator, because you will play as Mr Gun, the best shooter ever. Mr Gun has his enemy hit-list, so why don’t you help him and deliver headshots to guys from the list. Every boss from enemy hit-list is guarded by his bandits, so you will have to shoot them first. As always, you will earn tokens for completing levels, which you can spend on new guns and skins, which will bring you more fun in the process of crossing out names from your enemy hit list. So flip the gun, take your granny away from the screen and dive into our new simulator Mr Arms Gun.

In our new jailbreak simulator, you will have to find all your aiming skills and use them. Flip the gun and shoot all bandits to reach the boss of the level, who is in your enemy hit-list. For completing levels, you will earn tokens, which you can spend on better guns or new outfit for Mr Gun. Usual bandits will pass away from your very first shot, but bosses are tougher. Each following boss is stronger than the previous, so you will have to make more shots. Headshots bring you extra tokens and colossal damage for bosses. Be cautious, if Mr Gun will miss in our jailbreak simulator, even the simple bandit will shoot you like if you were a granny. So flip the gun and do not give them a chance to enjoy the feeling of a victory.

Mr Arms Gun is a free to play jailbreak simulator. Shoot these granny bandits and reach the bosses. Make sure that the bosses will think twice before crossing MR Gun the road again. Cross out names from your enemy hit-list one by one and get closer to your target. Also do not forget that for headshots you will earn extra tokens to spend in our in-game store. Buy new guns and outfit to defeat bosses faster and with style. Do not tell your granny about this jailbreak simulator! Just flip the gun and run this hardcore game. How far can you reach without missing? Download Mr Arms Gun to find out.
